channel.title: Tamberlane
channel.description: This is a comic about a girl who knows a lot of animals.
channel.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt

item.title: Page 1
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And so our story begins, with not so much of a BANG as a AWWAAAARRRARRRWRWRRRRAAAA

item.title: Page 2
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Run! Run away to tell everyone about the oogie boogie tree forest screaming monster! Aaaaaa!!!

item.title: Page 3
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Mushrooms, mushrooms, who's got the mushrooms?                                   Also this comic sure does have a lot of screaming.

item.title: Page 4
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Belfry ... Belfry, no, finish what you were doing.

item.title: Page 5
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Who forgets oven mitts? And on a regular basis? Belfry, of course!

item.title: Page 6
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Wait a second, that's not Coriander! That's an animal! Also, welcome to a world with Piper in it. It burns easy.

item.title: Page 7
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Piper, your talents are screaming and getting into trouble. They are never wasted.

item.title: Page 8
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: A little jumpy there, Ainsley? Also, wow Belfry does not know how to hold children.

item.title: Page 9
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Piper, you're such a poop.

item.title: Page 10
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Responsibility is overrated.

item.title: Page 11
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: This page brought to you by the screaming match I had with my 4 year old niece when I was 13. Also, poor Anthony. He just wants to learn about rocks, you guys. :(

item.title: Page 12
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: WHO'S THAT POKEMON?

item.title: Page 13
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Piper! Language!!

item.title: Page 14
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: This pie has seen some serious disaster in its very short time on this planet.

item.title: Page 15
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: She means well.

item.title: Page 16
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: This entire comic is nothing but histrionics, I hate to break it to you

item.title: Page 17
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Anthony is ... high-strung. But wouldn't you be, too, with Piper as your sister?

item.title: Page 18
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Whoopsidoodle!

item.title: Page 19
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Geez, Anthony. We've got a cold-blooded murderer here.

item.title: Page 20
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: That sure is a terrifying ghost.

item.title: Page 21
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Nice try, Piper. Belfry has to face her death with dignity.

item.title: Page 22
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: I mean, who doesn't want peas?

item.title: Page 23
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt

item.title: Page 24

item.title: Page 25
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: I think a change of scenery is in order!

item.title: Page 26
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Oh, Oakewood. You're kinda of a jerk, aren'tcha.

item.title: Page 27
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Ainsley might be a little melodramatic, but they Saw Things.

item.title: Page 28
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Oh. Oakewood. You're so funny. "Friends."

item.title: Page 29
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt

item.title: Page 30
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt

item.title: Page 32

item.description: A conflict! Hey, if you want to see how I do comics, I did a tutorial off this page! You can find it in the shop!

item.title: Page 33

item.title: Page 42
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And that's the end of the prologue!!! I hope you enjoyed it! There's going to be a week off for breathing room, and then Chapter 2 will start apace!

item.title: Page 43
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And Chapter 2 BEGINS! ... You so sure it's not a mistake, Bel?

item.title: Page 44
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Ta da...! Happy American Thanksgiving, everyone! I hope you have a great one!

item.title: Page 45
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Babies are totally the best. Yep.

item.title: Page 46
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Oh my god, how she tries.

item.title: Page 47
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Look what you signed up for! :D

item.title: Page 48
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Swamp Monster: the 63rd gender.

item.title: Page 49
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: How do I shot web Eyyy, it's my birthday in 4 days! :D

item.title: Page 50
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Halfway to 100 pages! :D AND it's my birthday! Happy birthday to me! Tamberlane is now going to go on Winter Break so I can build up my buffer again! The Kickstarter, the holidays, and a drive-by illness have depleted my stash of finished pages not QUITE entirely, but enough that I'd like the time to make sure there's enough in the pan to keep me going. Therefore, Tamberlane will return January 11! But! If you just can't stay away from Tamberlane, you have some options! If you drop $1 on my Patreon, Tamberlane will resume January 4th for you, and for as long as you're supporting it, you'll get pages A WEEK early! Still not enough? At $10 a month, you get to follow my private projects twitter where you get to see EVERY page AS it's made. Currently, I do believe my $10 patrons are 4 pages ahead and will be much further along by the time the public site starts up again! Rest assured, this is no hiatus; I have no intention of stopping work on Tamberlane any time soon. This comic is my love and my life. I just want to make sure I also have time and energy to be with my family this holiday -- and for my birthday -- too! See you guys soon! Happy holidays, and thank you SO MUCH for reading this story! I'm so excited to bring you more!

item.title: Page 51
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And we're back!! It's a good thing I went on Break, because I wound up being sick the entire month of December. But I'm better now! I'm going to be at Further Confusion in San Jose this weekend! Come see me at the Grey White / Dreamy Star table 123. I'll have some (non-deluxe, non-Kickstarter) printed editions of Tamberlane, stickers, charms, and more cool stuff! I hope to see you guys there!

item.title: Page 52
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Possibly NSFW for furry breastfeeding...? Anyway, hey look, Tamberlane made a friend! Also, may I introduce our first Patreon cameo: Terra! She belongs to Neon Noble and she's ADORABLE.

item.description: I can't believe Henry is dead.

item.title: Page 57

item.description: At last!! Freed from the tyranny of pink and purple!! Poor Tamberlane.

item.title: Page 58
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Wuh oh. Support Tamberlane on Patreon! For $1 a month, you get to see comic pages a week earlier than everyone else. Feeling cool? You can donate more to get cool rewards like seeing pages up to a month ahead, character cameos, movie night, monthly postcards, and more! What are you waiting for? Join the cool club!

item.title: Page 63
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description:
All sorts of cameos in today's comic!
The big one is Sylvia, the tabby/samoyed mix, who is a Patreon cameo! In addition, the mechanic wolf at the top is Dorian, another Patreon cameo! Thanks you guys! Besides that we have Kaylee and Shallari from Anaria , Aria from Envelove, a self-insert of me and my husband, Onnanoko , and of course Beleth from Floraverse ! See the making of this page on YouTube! [embed]https://youtu.be/zkbuiIdL2jQ[/embed]

item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Hey! Tamberlane has some goddamn clothes now! See the making of this page on YouTube! [embed]https://youtu.be/FzcunQnue5g[/embed]

item.title: Page 66
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Haha WHOOPS! Also hi again, Terra! In case you forgot, Terra's a Patreon cameo! :D See the making of this page on YouTube! [embed]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qfaNjZ9ma2Y[/embed]

item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt

item.title: Page 68
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: I hope you've been enjoying your tour of Treehollow so far! It's been a lot of fun to draw! (Although also a little maddening. Why do I do this to myself?? Oh yeah, because it's totally worth it!) See the making of this page on YouTube! [embed]https://youtu.be/TUstGZogw50[/embed]

item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: It's page 69! Nice. B) See the making of this page on YouTube! [embed]https://youtu.be/oV2E3V5ifSM[/embed]

item.title: Page 70
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Some teeny tiny cameos on this page! Hindae's griff is on the boat to the left! He's a $50 patron! Ashley Nichols's Kira is on the boat eating an apple! And Abigail Starling gets a fursona in the little otter on Hindae's boat! See the making of this page on YouTube! [embed]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AFyYGJI4nE4[/embed]

item.title: Page 71
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Poor Tamberlane. :( There's a time-lapse available of this page on my Youtube! Go watch it! PS, if you wanna be a big help, subscribe to my channel: after I hit 100, I'll be able to make my Youtube URL actually memorable instead of a hash of letters and numbers! [embed]https://youtu.be/ztbgtSskaaI[/embed]

item.title: Page 72
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Keep trying, Tamberlane! You'll get it someday! There's a time-lapse available of this page on my youtube! [embed]https://youtu.be/3Dwh_xIwhEw[/embed]

item.title: Page 73
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Some new cameos today! Firstly, the possum is Fallon Bard - Fallboard's character, from the "Your Character Here" auction winner! I'd say he looks pretty cute! Next, in that first panel, the meerkat is Timmo, another peek at a Patreon cameo. (Like all of these patreon cameos, it won't just be limited to a tiny appearance on the horizon; of course he'll get some proper 'screen' time too!) The bird is Grey White, and the bear is their husband Davin! You can watch the making of this page on YouTube! [embed]https://youtu.be/vZAZLZHhc3M[/embed]

item.title: Page 74
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Oh good, a rescue! You can watch the making of this page on my YouTube page! [embed]https://youtu.be/ZnwX-9AcKDc[/embed]

item.description: Trissol: Silver Sage Sign Language Triple-S Language Tri-S-L Trissol. [embed]https://youtu.be/66V5hzItfWU[/embed]

item.description: It's a damn shame.

item.title: Page 78
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Tamberlane has had a very rough 24 hours.

item.title: Page 79
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: We have some cameos happening today! The german shepherd is Patreon cameo John! Thanks, John Deemer! The dragon-dolphin (or "dergolphin" if you will) is also a Patreon cameo, Callie! Thanks, Zaukodar! The horse is RJ, her appearance graciously donated in place of Dorian's Patreon cameo! And finally, the priest Vessie is a Patreon cameo! Thanks, Citizenrob! If you want your character in the comic, you should check out the Tamberlane Patreon! You can get all that and more!!

item.title: Page 80
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: We have some cameos happening today! The german shepherd is Patreon cameo John! Thanks, John Deemer! The dragon-dolphin (or "dergolphin" if you will) is also a Patreon cameo, Callie! Thanks, Zaukodar! The horse is RJ, her appearance graciously donated in place of Dorian's Patreon cameo! And finally, the priest Vessie is a Patreon cameo! Thanks, Citizenrob! If you want your character in the comic, you should check out the Tamberlane Patreon! You can get all that and more!!

item.title: Page 81
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: I'm sorry except I'm not sorry at all that this Chapter 2 is sorta full of Feels. But man, you have to have a place to work up from! Hey guys, did you see Henry and Nora's cameo in Anaria??? OH MY GOSH. Check it out: https://anaria.dreamystar.net/comic/side-story-winters-light-page-9/

item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Hello again, Terra and Sylvia! Two lovely Patreon cameos thanks to Michael "Neon Noble" Nicolosi and Skye "Kittypup" Aisling! And they're SMOOCHIN! This page brings Chapter 2's page count up past Chapter 1's. Huzzah!!

item.title: Page 91
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Whew!!! No more tears needed. I can be a benevolent writer sometimes.

item.title: Page 92
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: This page took me 2x as long as normal but I'm really proud of it. Looks like it's time for a little heart to heart, eh?

item.title: Page 93
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: There is only one cure for a sad Belfry: Completely ignoring it.

item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Belfry, get you some self-esteem, bats.

item.title: Page 95
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt

item.title: Page 96
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt

item.title: Page 97
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: "Welp, she feels better. I can put on my cranky gruff pants again."

item.title: Page 98
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Aww. And with that, aside from the endcap page that will go up tomorrow, Chapter 2 is complete! The next few weeks I'm going to spend focusing on getting Chapter 3 going and up to speed and in the meantime, I have a lovely crop of guest comics and art to show you guys! I can't wait! :D

item.title: Page 99
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Piper spends a lot of time in that corner.

item.title: Page 100
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: AND WE'RE BACK! Thank you so much everyone for your beautiful guest art and comics. Having this extended guest period REALLY helped me get back on my feet during a difficult time. But we're all good now! Chapter 3 begins with the official 100th page of Tamberlane! Which is REALLY NUTS. This comic is just over a year old, so I suppose it's a rate of about 100 pages a year so far. Let's see if we can't bump that up if my health holds out, hey? Anyway, I hope you guys enjoy chapter 3! Looks like Tamberlane's grown up a smidgeon.

item.title: Page 114
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Welcome back to our regularly scheduled pages! Thank you all so much for your patience while Caytlin wasn't feeling well. We all really appreciate it and we hope you enjoyed all the lovely fan art!! As for Piper...let's see if she can behave long enough...haha! ~Panda assistant :D

item.title: Page 115
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: :O

item.title: Page 116
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: I'm suuuure he'll be fiiiiiine. Today begins the change over to 1 page a week until I have recovered my buffer! I hate doing this, but you do what you gotta. See you next Wednesday!

item.title: Page 122
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: GASP! Who let all these bats in here?! Here are some new Patreon cameos! The stripey gryphon is Captain Gillian, cameo of Hindae! The two pint-sized bats in the hats are cameos of Lightfox Lowell! I know you said to pick one, but they were both so cute! And finally, the tall purple bat is Winnie, cameo of Makuru! Thank you all SO MUCH for your support!

item.title: Page 124
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Peas are what make the world go around, according to Tamberlane "Snapdragon" Belfriton. Also: Jason is a patron cameo of Marco262 (also my husband, who throws his own spending money into my patreon because he's a big goddamn sweetheart!), and also, gasp???? Who's that???

item.title: Page 125
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: IT'S A BIRDHORSE!!! Milo is D'Archangel's Patron cameo and all around cutie patootie! Sophie was, in her source material, a big ol' cross spider; but since I didn't want to look at reference material, he kindly let me alter her to a moth. c: Thanks darch!

item.title: Page 133

item.description: Look at all these Patreon cameos: The little pink kangaroo mouse is Mimfry, patreon cameo of StarshineBeast! The mail squirrel is Aria, patreon cameo of Steve Streza! The deer cameo is Becca, patreon cameo of Specs AK! And the panther cameo is Isaiah, patreon cameo of NoteWorthy! Thanks so much for your support, you guys!!

item.title: Page 137
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Whoops, someone has a crush! Haha, sorry for the slightly late post. This is what happens when my assistant goes on a business trip and I assure her not to worry, that I will do the updates. Then I forget! WHOOPS.

item.title: Page 138
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Finally, something besides peas!!!

item.title: Page 139
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Whew!! This was a real thorny page! Lots and lots of things had to get drawn. As you can imagine, there are a lot of cameos! PANEL ONE: The badger belongs to Grey White! PANEL TWO: The raccoon belongs to Ashley Nichols and Puck belongs to Codesign! PANEL FOUR: Gunner the bat belongs to Gunny Waffle, Asher the fox belongs to, well, Asher the Fox, and Reno the dingo belongs to DireTaco. So glad to get more sunny faces on the page here!!!

item.title: Page 140
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Wow, what a jerk!!! That crow is a cameo named Leon, courtesy of Hexen! I ran a quick auction on the Patreon Discord  for the cameo slot and he won! Hope your bittersweet victory is worth it! ;)

item.title: Page 141
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Thanks for stopping by and dropping some worldbuilding, Leon!

item.title: Page 142
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Poor Tamberlane just wants to help.

item.title: Page 143
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Hello again, Isaiah! Isaiah is once again a Patreon cameo for Note Worthy! Thanks for your support, man!

item.title: Page 144
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: That darn cat! You may notice that the website has been updated and changed! Surprise! :D I've been working for the last two months on this site. We've migrated off of Squarespace (and therefore fixed a lot of the really buggy things about the site) and onto Wordpress! For those of you supporting Tamberlane on Patreon, there's a Patron-only section with links to rewards, and the WIP blog has moved here too! Eventually, if I can get it to work, I'll have a section where patrons can check on the latest comic available for them, but for now, that's but a dream. Still, for now, I think it looks smashing! I hope you guys enjoy it as much as I do! I'm sure there will be technical difficulties over the next few days; drop me a line via comments here or over email at artist@cvilbrandt.com! I'll fix it as fast as I'm able :) EDITED TO ADD: Patreon login is currently having issues, which I am working on resolving. Thanks for your patience! EDIT 2: Patreon issues should be resolved! Let me know if there are any other problems and I'll fix them ASAP.

item.title: Page 145
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Oh no! Not the deer!!

item.title: Page 146
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: She's got a heart under there! Somewhere... Today's cameo is Timmothy, the meerkat! Thanks, Timmo, for your donation to the Patreon cause! <3

item.title: Page 147
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: The latest page stars two new Patreon cameos: Twitchel, from Vertis Sidus, and Rhode, from RainbowJuice! They're the town apothecary and junior apothecary (herbalist specialized) respectively. Thanks for supporting Tamberlane, you guys!!

item.title: Page 148
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Man, the apothecary really needs to sand their crates down. Splinters are no bueno! Hello again to Twitchel and Rhode, two patreon cameos! Want to see this page being made? Check it out on YouTube!

item.title: Page 149
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Aww, Oakewood has a feeling.

item.title: Page 150
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Wow! We're at page 150 already! And Allaze's patreon cameo Mary crops up for a brief appearance. We'll see her again! Thanks for lending me Mary, Allaze!

item.title: Page 151
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Walter has many wise things to say. He needs a page where he's not being old man on the mountain.

item.title: Page 152
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Is that a flashback I see?

item.title: Page 153
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Whoops, surprise life change!

item.title: Page 154
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: I'm pretty sure there should be more dialogue between both partners when adopting a child...

item.title: Page 155
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Who're these new jokers??? CAMEO DELUGE!!! Thank you so much for your support of Tamberlane on the Patreon, you guys! The cowboy-hatted dingo is Diretaco's Reno The squirrel is MRAMP's Luna! The mouse is Terri Delgado's Abby! The wolf is Dorian's Bleddyn! The otter is Madiso's Madiso! The german shepherd is John's John! The punk corgi is Taggianto's Tagg! The pastel corgi is Dana's Danger!

item.title: Page 156
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: GASP, what meanies!! :Oc Thanks to D. G. Speirs's generous cameo donation of Houdini the cat! And of course, thanks again to Dana and Tagg for their cameo corgs :D

item.title: Page 157
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Hmm.. Nothing special about today's composition, Enjoy the corgs! :D

item.title: Page 158
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Man what is with these corgs? Hope you guys are enjoying the comic! Unfortunately, I'm taking a short break because I'm burnt out and exhausted and need some time to rest. But never fear! Tamberlane will return October 3rd! See you then, my friends!   UPDATE: 10-02-18: Hello Tamberlane Fans! Panda assistant here! Oh gosh, did we mess up with our date calculation...Caitlyn actually means to come back on Wednesday, October 10th, not Tomorrow, the 3rd. Big huge apologies for the mixup!! ^^; As always, we THANK YOU for your support and patience! One more week of rest for our fearless leader, and then back to the cuteness!! promise!!

item.title: Page 159
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Aaaaand we're back! Thank you so much for you patience, Everybody! <3

item.title: Page 160
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: WHEW!!! This is why there was an extra week of break. There are a lot of cameos in here, so let's identify them all! Starting from left to right, we have: Huni, the bunny, from Ashley Nichols Hi again Parsley! Peek, the korean water deer, from PK The mouse and lion are just random townspeople. Skelly, the cat (yes, a normal-ass animal), from Stray XIII Jackie, the jackal-cat, also from Stray XIII Cur, the jackal-gerboa, from Chaon Stoker, the bat, from Stoker Bramwell and Trisha, the marble fox, from Patrick Kingsley.

item.title: Page 161
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Gosh, no one wants to talk to those corgs. Continued thanks to StrayXIII for the loan of Jackie, and Taggianto and UncoolDana for the loan of Tagg and Danger!

item.title: Page 162
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: DUN DUN DUNNNNNNNN! But are they right, is the real question.

item.title: Page 163
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Spooky scary happenings!

item.title: Page 164
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Corgs exeunt stage left.

item.title: Page 165
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And a cameo who hasn't spent a lot of time in focus finally gets a word in! Welcome to Callie, Zaukodar's patreon cameo. Thanks as always for the support, Zau! Looks like Belfry and Tess still haven't given it a rest yet.

item.title: Page 166
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Zaukodar's Callie continues to buy her pies! Poor Briar. Callie will return later!

item.title: Page 167
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Briar steps up! Did you know that I am taking TAMBERLANE CROWD CAMEO COMMISSIONS?! $50 Each! Just a few slots available! Form closes December 6th. Payment due upfront when selected. Check out the form Here!! I'm also running a TAMBERLANE CROWD CAMEO RAFFLE!! 3 slots available for cameos in the upcoming crowd scene! To enter: 🌟Follow and RT 🌟Comment your favorite part of @tamberlanecomic! The raffle lasts until 9 am PST, December 6th! Winners will be picked at random and announced on twitter! :D

item.title: Page 168
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Briar is done dealing with your shit, y'all. Time to get with the program!

item.title: Page 169
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: NOW we're getting somewhere!

item.title: Page 170
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: NOW we're getting somewhere!

item.title: Page 171
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: YEAH, LEAD WITH THAT, GAWD KITTY CATFE CHARITY STREAM EVENT!! 01/07/19-01/12/019 The Kitty Catfe is in trouble and needs our help! Located in Edmonds, WA, this local cat cafe-slash-shelter needs to find a new space before February. With moving comes sudden moving costs, and we want to help the process go smoothly! With your contributions, we can help the Catfe find a new home! Join us as we create art for kitties! WE HAVE MET OUR FIRST GOAL OF $2500, BUT THE KITTY CATFE STILL NEEDS YOUR HELP! Kitties need food, toys, litter, medication, and other expenses to be covered! They are frequently operating on a shoestring budget and need all the help they can get! All proceeds made this week still go to them! Please check out our Charity Streaming Schedule HERE!

item.title: Page 172
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: So THAT'S why.

item.title: Page 173
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Mmmm, youthful optimism.

item.title: Page 174
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description:
And lo, I did take a long time but a beautiful page emerged! Let's try to do the character list from left to right, top to bottom, shall we? All bolded names are Patreon cameos! Thank you, guys!!

Character Guide

ROW 1 BENCHES: Viola, Aria (Steve Streza / Abigail Starling), Alahmnat (Alahmnat), Erik (CrosbowROoF), Captain Gillian (Hindae), Anthony, Jason (Marco262), Piper, Avery, Isaiah (NoteWorthy), Winnie (Makuru), Briar, Natasha (Matt) MID 1 & 2: Jackson (Foxlover91), Hattie & Artie (Lightfox Lowell) ROW 2 BENCHES: Oakewood, Tamberlane, Milo & Sophie (Darch), Aerdan (Aerdan), John (LongJohn), Shu (ShuTheSquirrel), Jentzen (JNSx7), Cammie & Skelly (StrayXIII), Chandra (Chandra), Rux (CouchCrusader) ROW 3 BENCHES: Bjørn (BearFlipsTable), Jonas (Jonas), RandomGeekNamedBrent, Terra (NeonNoble), Marie, Drake (Ken R.), Lace (Leah Briere), Vera (Isaac32), Frack (Frack), Coriander (Izzy), Zen (ZenFelwinter) MID 3 & 4: Honky Kat (Honky Kat),  Hope (Panda) ROW 4 BENCHES: Reno (DireTaco), Trish (Whyaylooh), Gunner (GunnyWaffle), Finn (Madiso), Mimfry (StarshineBeast), Abigail (Terri Delgado), Cur (Chaon), Maribelle (F-Frost), Dana (UncoolDana), Chiros (Chiropica) MIDGROUND: Greenie (Zaukodar), Slipstream (Grand Moff Joseph), Grey (Grey White), Stoker (StokerBat) STAGE: Hunni (Ashley Nichols), Timmothy (TimmoWarner) ALSO! There is a poster of this page in the shop!

item.title: Page 175
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Tess? The irresponsible one? Whodathunk. Thank you to today's Patreon cameos: Timmothy, the meerkat, from TimmoWarner! Bleddyn, the wolf, from Dorian Inman! Honey, the bunny, from Ashley Nichols! You can get your own Patreon cameo through, well, Patreon! All $50+ patrons get to show up in the comic and say a few words :D

item.title: Page 176
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Let's get this party started! Thank you to continuing Patreon cameos from Dorian (Bleddyn), Honey (Ashley Nichols), and Timmothy (TimmoWarner)! Want to show up in Treehollow? You can get your own Patreon cameo through Patreon! http://www.patreon.com/tamberlane

item.title: Page 177
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Huzzah!! A page!! I'm not back to work full time yet for sure. I can only handle a couple hours at the computer upstairs. But it's DEFINITE progress! And I look forward to continuing to improve. Meanwhile, storytime!

item.title: Page 178
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Nothing like some good ol' fashioned arson to keep things lively! Guess what! If you've been after some print copies of chapters 1 and 2, I have some news for you! They are now available in the new shop at http://tamberlane-merch.myshopify.com Use coupon code HOTDAMN before April 17th to get 10% off your entire order! Fulfillment will be complete in the next 2 weeks. Go get em!

item.title: Page 179
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And with that, Chapter 3 is over! Next week is the endcap illustration, and then a guest comic!! Thank you to Timmo for lending me Timmothy to end our chapter with a literally heartwarming story about arson. Your support on Patreon is invaluable!!

item.title: Page 180
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And that's a wrap, officially! A beautiful guest comic will be up for the next three weeks while I battle technical difficulties and such. But after that, Chapter 4 begins! Hold onto your hats, bundle up against the cold, and get ready to play in the snow!

item.title: Page 181
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Oh my gosh a time skip! Looks like class is in session for these tykes. Welcome to chapter 4! If you want to see the map without the frames in the way, it's available for all $10+ patrons! Hello to the following Patreon cameos: Callie, thanks to Zaukodar! Cur, thanks to Chaon! Jonas, thanks to Jonas! Kira, thanks to Ashley Nichols! Jenner, thanks to CrookedTeeth!

item.title: Page 182
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Cur has a mouth but Kira is a little troublemaker! Continued thanks to patrons for their cameos: Chaon (Cur), Ashley Nichols (Kira), and Zaukodar (Callie)!

item.title: Page 183
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Looks like Piper and Tamberlane are getting along better! Continued thanks for our Patreon cameo: Callie, from Zakuodar!

item.title: Page 184
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Poor Tamberlane looks so embarrassed! Thanks to Chaon (Cur) and Zaukodar (Callie) for their continued Patreon cameo! :D

item.title: Page 185
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Whoops! Callie got blindsided! Piper is asking the hard-hitting questions. Continued thanks for the Patreon cameos: Cur, from Chaon! Callie, from Zaukodar! Jentzen, from CrookedGlasses! Jonas, from Jonas! Kira, from Ashley Nichols! The CHAPTER 3 KICKSTARTER is on its way, ready to launch on a SECRET DAY in August!!! Packed full of fun goodies and a gorgeous printed book copy of Chapter 3, you won't want to miss it! There are a limited amount of SKETCHED BOOKPLATE BOOKS available which will contain a personalized, hand-drawn sketch! Dying to get one? They're going to go fast! The campaign will be launched first for $3+ Patrons, so they get FIRST SHOT at those sketch slots! Support at $3+ and get your headstart! Not able to support the Patreon? That's fine too! After the $3+ patrons get 12 hours, the KICKSTARTER MAILING LIST gets the next shot! This is DIFFERENT from the normal mailing list. Sign up for the mailing list HERE! After that, it'll go live to the public and I'll drop a post HERE! I'm super excited, you guys. It's going to be so GREAT! To help this Kickstarter be the VERY BEST it can be! Share the comic with your friends and spread the word! Get everyone SUPER PUMPED! LET'S KICK BUTT, EVERYONE!

item.title: Page 186
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Such salient questions! Turns out the kids aren't as informed as one would think... Continued thanks to Zaukodar (Callie) and Ashley Nichols (Kira) for their Patreon cameos! The CHAPTER 3 KICKSTARTER is on its way, ready to launch on a SECRET DAY in August!!! Packed full of fun goodies and a gorgeous printed book copy of Chapter 3, you won't want to miss it! There are a limited amount of SKETCHED BOOKPLATE BOOKS available which will contain a personalized, hand-drawn sketch! Dying to get one? They're going to go fast! The campaign will be launched first for $3+ Patrons, so they get FIRST SHOT at those sketch slots! Support at $3+ and get your headstart! Not able to support the Patreon? That's fine too! After the $3+ patrons get 12 hours, the KICKSTARTER MAILING LIST gets the next shot! This is DIFFERENT from the normal mailing list. Sign up for the mailing list HERE! After that, it'll go live to the public and I'll drop a post HERE! I'm super excited, you guys. It's going to be so GREAT! To help this Kickstarter be the VERY BEST it can be! Share the comic with your friends and spread the word! Get everyone SUPER PUMPED! LET'S KICK BUTT, EVERYONE!

item.title: Page 187
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: More questions, and some more questions, and still more questions! CrookedGlasses's Jentzen the cheetahwolf has finally been able to make a more substantial appearance. Yay! There's a bunch of text edits I wanted to make but honestly, it'll just have to happen for print. Cut me some slack, I am very tired Anyway, thanks also as usual to Chaon for Cur and Zaukodar for Callie. Thanks for lending me your children! BWOOP BWOOP! THIS IS NOT A DRILL! BWOOP BWOOP! The CHAPTER 3 TAMBERLANE KICKSTARTER is now LIVE! If you're looking for a beautiful printed copy of any of the three chapters so far, you're in the right place! Tamberlane's Chapter 3 Kickstarter is off with a BANG! The heart-squeezing comic about a disaster bat trying to care for a mysterious creature -- a human child -- has so many great prizes! And there are lots of chances for even MORE!

item.title: Page 188
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Intrigue and conspiracy! :3c Thank you as always to Chaon for Cur, Zaukodar for Callie, Ashley Nichols for Kira, and CrookedGlasses for Jentzen! BWOOP BWOOP! THIS IS NOT A DRILL! BWOOP BWOOP! The CHAPTER 3 TAMBERLANE KICKSTARTER is now LIVE! If you're looking for a beautiful printed copy of any of the three chapters so far, you're in the right place! Tamberlane's Chapter 3 Kickstarter is off with a BANG! The heart-squeezing comic about a disaster bat trying to care for a mysterious creature -- a human child -- has so many great prizes! And there are lots of chances for even MORE!

item.title: Page 189
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: OOOOH SNAP. The glove has come OFF. Thanks as usual to Zaukodar for lending me Callie, CrookedGlasses for lending me Jentzen, Chaon for lending me Cur, and Ashley Nichols for lending me Kira! Get your own Patreon cameo here! The Kickstarter has been going SWIMMINGLY! We just hit our first stretch goal, some adorable pencil/dice pouches adorned with cute Tamberlane and Belfry expressions! Check out the Kickstarter and help us reach our next stretch goal: a variant cover by Minty Messerly!

item.title: Page 190
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Seems like the day took a toll on everyone involved. What's next for our poor characters? Thanks as usual to Zaukodar for lending me Callie, CrookedGlasses for lending me Jentzen, Chaon for lending me Cur, and Ashley Nichols for lending me Kira! Get your own Patreon cameo here! There are 6 DAYS LEFT on the Tamberlane Kickstarter! We've got a little under $5k until the next stretch goal -- help us reach new heights! And in return, get some Kickstarter-exclusive swag like the special variant cover by Minty Messerly! What are you waiting for? Go back the Kickstarter now!!

item.title: Page 191
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Welp, game over, Marie is sad. That's it for this comic. I've killed everyone. Thanks to Chaon for Cur, Ashley Nichols for Kira, and Jonas for, well, Jonas! Yay Patreon cameos! Upgrade to $50+ to get your own cameo in the comic! The Kickstarter is ENDING THIS MORNING! Better get in before it ends!!

item.title: Page 192
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Poor Marie. Good thing she has a support network of friends! 2 trips to the ER, a second painkiller prescription, and a lot of sleepless nights later, I think the kidney stone is passed?? Hopefully? Drink your water, kids! Kidney stones suck! And now I can get back to motoring on work. I can't tell you how badly I want to get ahead of all this! The Kickstarter has ended fabulously and I'm so thrilled! If you missed out, the preorder store is open. They will be delivered after the Kickstarter is fulfilled, but should still get to you before Christmas! You know, if you're already thinking about holiday gifts.

item.title: Page 193
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: So many reasons for rage-beast! The Kickstarter has ended fabulously and I'm so thrilled! If you missed out, the preorder store is open! They will be delivered after the Kickstarter is fulfilled, but should still get to you before Christmas! You know, if you're already thinking about holiday gifts.

item.title: Page 194
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And we return! Thank you so much for your patience. I know a lot of folks missed the comic while I was away but I had a lot of things to sort out between health and personal stuff. I'm feeling better and I'm ready to get back to things! Enjoy! Look who's here! The P-Gang: Parsley, Parker, and Penny! And also a physical altercation! Oh boy oh boy. Special thanks to patrons Chaon for Cur, Ashley Nichols for Kira, and Jonas for Jonas! Thanks for letting me use your babies!

item.title: Page 195
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Right to the kisser! Ouch! Special thanks to patrons Chaon for Cur, Ashley Nichols for Kira, and Jonas for Jonas! Thanks for letting me use your babies! An incredibly rare opportunity has surfaced! For the first time in several years, I am vending at a convention! Come see me at table 904 at GeekGirlCon this weekend in Seattle! I'll have tons of great stuff for sale, including Chapter 3, tote bags, blankets, enamel pins, stickers, and more! [caption id="attachment_3351" align="aligncenter" width="1000"] Geek Girl Con Menu 1[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3352" align="aligncenter" width="1000"] Geek Girl Con Menu 2[/caption] This isn't going to happen often: I'm unable to travel much and I have to safeguard my health. So if you want to meet me and say hi, maybe pick up some awesome merch, now's a good chance! I hope to see you all there! Kickstarter fulfillment should go off without a hitch over the next three days in preparation, so if you're expecting a Kickstarter package, I hope you're excited. I know I am!

item.title: Page 196
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Oops, someone got into trouble! Special thanks to patrons Chaon for Cur, Ashley Nichols for Kira, and Jonas for Jonas! Thanks for letting me use your babies!

item.title: Page 197
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: WHOOPS! Caught red-pawed! ...and poor Tamberlane is having a heck of a time today, isn't she? :( Thanks again to Chaon for letting me use Cur in his Patreon cameo!

item.title: Page 198
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Poor sad Tamberlane. I promise the tears will stop ... soon ... probably.

item.title: Page 199
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Anthony has all the answers! And Piper ... well, Piper is unapologetically her.   Saturday's my birthday! Yay! Happy birthday to me :D Thank you all for the wonderful birthday gift of reading my little story here. It means a lot to me!

item.title: Page 200
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: And that's page 200! Wow! I can't believe it's been 200 whole pages of Tamberlane so far. And what a nice page, too. Enjoy the warm and fuzzies!

item.title: Page 201
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Some things are not meant for kiddo ears!

item.title: Page 202
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: The eternal conflict between Mother Bear feelings and wanting to be fair to a beat up kid.

item.title: Page 203
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Nothing can go wrong with Belfry looking after the kids! Definitely! This is a GOOD IDEA.

item.title: Page 204
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: BOOKS!!!

item.title: Page 205
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: TIME TO PANIC!!!! BOOKS DIDN'T WORK!!!!

item.title: Page 206
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: WHOOP THERE IT IS

item.title: Page 207
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: BELFRY HAS AN EMOTION. >:U And possibly... information?

item.title: Page 208
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Uncle to the rescue!! This conversation can't get any awkwarder, right?

item.title: Page 209
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Something tells me that will be a whole other can of worms... Custom Fields

item.title: Page 210
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: I had a lot of fun with this page! Expressions, character perspective, lots of fun stuff to practice. Also both Tamberlane and Belfry seem to be getting a little more assertive. Good on them!

item.title: Page 211
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Don't worry, Belfry! You're making this harder on yourself than you need to.

item.title: Page 212
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Welcome to Peek-a-Books!! I spent way, way too much time on this thing, but I love it anyway. The 2 new faces are Patreon cameos for Peek the water deer (from patron Peek), and Scott the bunny/iguana (from patron Scott)! Thank you for letting me play with your characters!

item.title: Page 213
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Tamberlane has so many worries for such a tiny kid. Continued thanks to patron Scott for letting me use...well, Scott!

item.title: Page 214
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Gasp! A fancy book! Thank you to Peek for the generous loaning of his character... Peek!

item.title: Page 215
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Someone teach Oakewood how to haggle correctly. Thanks again to Peek for the generous loaning of his character...Peek!

item.title: Page 216
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Many have been asking about Peek's fangs. He's not a hybrid: he's a water deer!

item.title: Page 217
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: The hardest part about Belfry bartering things is finding something she can provide without hurting herself and those around her with collateral damage.

item.title: Page 218
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description: Tamberlane's day seems to have picked up! I'm trying something new on this background. Usually I make the backgrounds meticulously with every surface on its own layer for maximum customizability for the scene if I need it. But that takes FOREVER. So this time I'm doing a single layer and painting it all at once, with a few parts of it on different layers so I can adjust as needed. Let me know what you think!

item.title: Page 219
item.dc:creator: Caytlin Vilbrandt
item.description:
Story time! Story time!!
I know if MY mom had a fluffy ruff, I would be divebombing into it for snuggles, too!
